hero.title: About Me
hero.subtitle: Senior Full-Stack Engineer specializing in AI/ML integration and scalable platform architecture

paragraphs: With 9+ years of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in building end-to-end platforms from scratch, leading technical architecture decisions, and integrating Gen AI capabilities into production systems. My expertise spans React, TypeScript, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and cloud infrastructure, with a strong focus on AI/ML integration and scalable platform architecture.

I bring 5+ years of hands-on experience in AI/ML Integration, Gen AI, LLM Orchestration, and Vector Databases, having built RAG-powered business intelligence features, deployed fine-tuned LLMs, and implemented distributed training pipelines. My work includes architecting MLOps platforms, AI-powered vector search systems, and real-time document analysis engines with 94%+ accuracy.

With 4+ years in Cloud Infrastructure and DevOps, I've established zero-downtime deployment pipelines, comprehensive observability infrastructure, and zero-trust security platforms. I'm passionate about leading technical initiatives, mentoring engineers, and shipping impactful features that process millions of requests daily while maintaining 99.9%+ uptime.

hero.title: Let's Connect
hero.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
hero.responseNote: I typically respond within 24-48 hours. For urgent matters, please mention "urgent" in your subject line.
